reiseplugin.gui

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • reiseplugin.gui.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The Controller class for the gui.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Controller.ControllerProxy
      A proxy for the Controller class that limits the access to methods.

        service - The IService to use for data requests.
        parent - The JFrame containing the look and feel settings.
        debug - Determines whether or not debug mode is on.
